td.content: s:pt presents with Heart for 6 days. she has a history of Heart Murmur for past 3 years. pt is a 50 YO white F. she denies ever using cigarettes she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 154 cm, Weight 51.1 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

td.content: s:51 year old white F bellhop complains of Heart and other medical problems. NKDA. she denies smoking Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 154 cm, Weight 50.8 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:51 YO female bellhop presents with 15 months history of Heart. o:Height 154 cm, Weight 51.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 77, Respiration 17 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed nitroprusside - 3 mcg/kg/min IV, and ordered percutaneous balloon mitral valvuloplasty - heart.
